text: At a party or family gathering, you prefer to:
optionA: Talk to as many people as possible
optionB: Stay with a few close people you know well

text: After a long day of work or studies, you recharge by:
optionA: Going out with friends or family
optionB: Staying home alone in a quiet environment

text: In a work group, you tend to:
optionA: Speak up and share your ideas spontaneously
optionB: Think carefully before expressing yourself

text: When you meet new people, you:
optionA: Feel comfortable and easily start conversations
optionB: Take time to observe before opening up

text: On weekends, your idea of a good day is:
optionA: Going out, seeing people and doing group activities
optionB: Staying in, reading or doing a solo activity

text: At work or school, you prefer:
optionA: Open spaces where you can interact with everyone
optionB: A quiet space where you can focus

text: When you have a problem to solve, you:
optionA: Talk it over with several people to get opinions
optionB: Prefer to think it through alone first

text: In a conversation, you are more someone who:
optionA: Talks a lot and keeps the conversation going
optionB: Listens and speaks when you have something important to say

text: Your friends would describe you as:
optionA: Social, open and easy to approach
optionB: Quiet, reserved but deep in relationships

text: When you are in a noisy and lively place, you:
optionA: Feel energized and stimulated
optionB: Quickly feel tired and look for a quiet spot

text: When learning something new, you prefer:
optionA: Concrete examples and practical cases
optionB: Understanding concepts and theories in depth

text: To make an important decision, you mainly rely on:
optionA: Concrete facts and what has already happened
optionB: Your intuition and future possibilities

text: When you read a text, you pay more attention to:
optionA: Precise details and factual information
optionB: The overall meaning and main ideas

text: In your daily work, you prefer:
optionA: Clear tasks with well-defined steps
optionB: Varied projects with room for creativity

text: You trust more:
optionA: What you can see, touch and verify
optionB: Your instinct and gut feelings

text: When you think about the future, you:
optionA: Think about concrete and achievable plans
optionB: Dream of great possibilities even if far away

text: For you, what matters most is:
optionA: What is practical and useful right now
optionB: What could be possible tomorrow

text: When a friend tells you about a problem, you tend to:
optionA: Help them find a logical and effective solution
optionB: First listen and offer comfort and support

text: When choosing between two options, you mainly rely on:
optionA: Logic and what is objectively best
optionB: What you feel and the impact on the people involved

text: At work, you believe decisions should be made:
optionA: Based on facts and analysis, even if unpopular
optionB: Taking into account feelings and human relationships

text: When someone makes a mistake, you prefer to:
optionA: Tell them directly so they can improve
optionB: Find a gentle way to help them understand

text: In your daily life, you prefer:
optionA: Having a well-organized schedule and following it
optionB: Staying flexible and adapting to situations

text: When you have a project to submit, you:
optionA: Finish it well before the deadline
optionB: Work better under pressure, close to the deadline

text: Your workspace or room is generally:
optionA: Well organized and tidy
optionB: A bit messy but you know where everything is

text: When you go on a trip, you:
optionA: Plan everything in advance: hotel, transport, activities
optionB: Prefer to improvise and see what comes up

text: When facing an unfinished task, you:
optionA: Feel uncomfortable until it is done
optionB: Can easily set it aside and come back to it later

text: In a group project, you prefer:
optionA: Clearly defining roles and steps from the beginning
optionB: Letting things fall into place naturally

text: When plans change at the last minute, you:
optionA: Feel stressed and prefer to stick to the original plan
optionB: Adapt easily and find it stimulating

text: When going shopping, you:
optionA: Make a list and stick to it
optionB: Buy based on what inspires you in the moment

text: At the end of the week, you feel better when:
optionA: Everything that was planned has been accomplished
optionB: You had the freedom to do what you wanted
